text_content.full_text:
SYDNEY COUNCIL
Building Certification Services
123 Council Street, Sydney NSW 2000 | Phone: 02 9999 8888
BUILDING PERMIT - APPROVED
Permit Number: BP-2024-08756 Development Type: New Dwelling
Issue Date: 15 January 2024 Estimated Value: $650,000
Expiry Date: 15 January 2026 Class of Building: Class 1a
PROPERTY DETAILS
Address: 123 Sunset Boulevard, Sydney NSW 2000
Lot/DP: Lot 45 DP 123456
Owner: John & Mary Smith
Builder: ABC Construction Pty Ltd (Lic: 123456C)
APPROVED WORKS
Construction of new two-storey residential dwelling including:
(cid:127) Total floor area: 245m²
(cid:127) 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, double garage
(cid:127) Concrete slab on ground foundation
(cid:127) Timber frame construction with brick veneer
(cid:127) Terracotta tile roof
MANDATORY INSPECTIONS REQUIRED
1. Excavation and footings before concrete pour
2. Foundation and slab reinforcement before pour
3. Frame inspection before cladding
4. Wet area waterproofing before tiling
5. Stormwater drainage before backfil
